title: How I get triggered
body:
When I am the ONLY one on my team with a positive KDA and the only one that took objectives, even stealing baron, and after the match my adc trash talks me, telling me I suck.

I swear to God, some of you people.....I rage all the time on here, and after the match,  but I would NEVER talk shit to the only good player on my team after a loss, especially if me and everyone else had awful scores like 1/9 and 3/11.

The fact that some of you do that in the chat just to try to upset someone who is already obviously disappointed in a loss despite playing well, is really the lowest personality trait....flaw...you can have.

It means that, you literally enjoy others suffering. Sure, right now its just that you like others being upset or annoyed, and its funny to you.  But taken further, that same flaw could easily let you enjoy the pain of others pr the death of others. Given some real power, you would certainly become a monster over time, a brutal tyrant who's ego is only placated by controlling others and harming others. 

And then they say, its just a game. Sure it is, but the person who is doing this is a total piece of shit human being and I am more upset at his existence than the match I just lost.
